sentences.english: Sets of works published by the Metropolitan Express.
sentences.chinese: 多套作品被都市快报刊登。

sentences.english: The allegations were first reported in the Swedish newspaper Expressen.
sentences.chinese: 指控第一次被报道是在瑞士快报上。

sentences.english: The headline in our Grand Rapids Press wasn't good news.
sentences.chinese: 今天，《大湍市快报》的头条并非好消息。

sentences.english: Their findings are reported in the journal Geophysical Research Letters.
sentences.chinese: 《地球物理研究快报》杂志报道了他们的研究成果。

sentences.english: range of Leonardo's exponent, Eloy reveals in a paper soon to be published in Physical Review Letters.
sentences.chinese: 这一研究成果即将发表在《物理评论快报》上。

sentences.english: The team published their findings in Geophysical Research Letters.
sentences.chinese: 该小组在《地球物理研究快报》上发表他们的发现。

sentences.english: Awake, O bell! proclaim the hour.
Paramount News brings you special  coverage of Princess Ann's visit to London.
sentences.chinese: 派氏新闻社，插播一新闻快报，安公主刻正拜访伦敦。

sentences.english: Then came the voice of another newsboy selling the "Stop-press News, " bawling as he ran past.
sentences.chinese: 接着又来了第二个卖“快报”的带喊带跑的声音。

sentences.english: The new research was published in the journal Biology Letters.
sentences.chinese: 此项新研究发表在《生物学快报》上。

sentences.english: The corroboration appears online in the journal Physical Review Letters. [Francis Everitt et al.
sentences.chinese: 这项结果发表在《物理评论快报》的在线杂志上。

sentences.english: The findings will appear in the Astro-Physics Journal Letters.
sentences.chinese: 这些发现的现象将刊登在宇宙物理学杂志快报上。

sentences.english: The report was published in the journal Geophysical Research Letters.
sentences.chinese: 这份报告发表在《地球物理研究快报》。

sentences.english: The corroboration appears online in the journal Physical Review Letters.
sentences.chinese: 此研究结果发表在《物理评论快报》网络版上。

definition: evening newspaper/(in a newspaper's name) Evening News
morning newspaper/(in a newspaper's name) Morning Post
Toutiao, personalized content recommendation app (abbr. for 今日頭條|今日头条[Jin1 ri4 Tou2 tiao2])
to carry a story/to publish (in a newspaper or magazine)
